task: Develop a basic 'Catan' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Make a blank valuable by putting it in an exquisite frame'.
name: Framed Settlements

branding_data.short_description: Framed Settlements is a strategic board game inspired by 'Catan', where players enhance the value of their settlements through strategic framing and resource management.
branding_data.detailed_description: Framed Settlements reimagines the classic 'Catan' experience by introducing a unique mechanic inspired by the oblique strategy 'Make a blank valuable by putting it in an exquisite frame'. In this game, players not only compete to build settlements and roads on a modular hexagonal board, but they also have the opportunity to frame their settlements. By placing exquisite frames around their settlements, players can increase their value and influence on the board. The game introduces new resources and strategies focused on acquiring and utilizing frames effectively. With a blend of familiar resource management and innovative framing tactics, Framed Settlements challenges players to think creatively and strategically to dominate the board.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
strategy: Make a blank valuable by putting it in an exquisite frame
